alert.note: Alert for Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:49PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Morrison County through 615 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Little Falls, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Little Falls around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Camp Ripley. This includes U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 136 and 152. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
